value.title: Receive notifications for image analysis with Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels and analyze predictions

value.title: Facial recognition system to be launched at Pune airport in 2023
value.excerpt: A facial recognition system will be launched at Pune's Lohegaon Airport by March 2023, Minister of State for Civil Aviation VK Singh said in Parliament. The system will be launched as part of the Centre's Digi Yatra initiative to provide passengers "seamless and hassle-free experience at airports".
